sent.orig: This is an interdisciplinary workshop, not a design workshop in the ordinary sense.

sent.orig: The remaining Parenting Workshop sessions in April have been cancelled; the Workshop will resume in May!
sent.trans: 北威亲情园地四月份聚会取消。大家五月再谈！
